item.title: Lamppost hit by waste collection truck, 22nd June
item.description:

item.title: Broken section of river wall on Thames Footpath, 22nd June
item.description:
Butch Master Riverboat crashed to river wall on Thursday 19th of June. Section of wall now on path. Teenagers have been trying to move it and throw parts oty the river. Hasard for path users. Further issue - apparently there is more damage to the wall on the riverside

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 305, Rotherhithe Street, Rotherhithe, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on the wall of Tabard House, 22nd June
item.description:
On the left side of the Tabard House building (looking from Manciple St), graffiti made on the wall and window. The nearby tiled and metal fences also sprayed. Really upsetting that this appeared to have been made at the Tabard South Tenants and Residents Association Street Party. Asking the council to strongly tell off the organisers of the party and cut funding for any future parties as this one just caused nuisance (mess and noise) for the residents.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manciple Street, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin bags pilling up next to bike storage, 22nd June
item.description:
A number of bin bags have been left next to the bike storage at the trip of Burwash Road. Started off as two but someone keeps adding to the pile. Bags have been there for a few weeks now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Burwash Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
